parts.name: Drums
parts.notes: 156 BPM. Forward momentum. Hit on 'Howl' accents.

parts.name: Rhythm Guitar
parts.notes: Punchy punk chords. Chorus should lift explosively.

parts.name: Lead Guitar
parts.notes: Overlay melodic motifs. Consider delay on outro.

parts.name: Vocals
parts.notes: Urban myth delivery. Reverb or echo on 'howl' lines.
